text: Khashtuk () is a rural locality (an aul) in Afipsipskoye Rural Settlement of Takhtamukaysky District, the Republic of Adygea, Russia. The population was 269 as of 2018. There are 8 streets. == Geography == The aul is on the left bank of the Kuban River. == Ethnicity == The aul is inhabited by Circassians. == References == Category:Rural localities in Takhtamukaysky District
title: Khashtuk
